metadata.title: Walking Cradles Women's Lila Slide Sandal
description: Walking Cradles is the "Want Them. Need Them. Must Have Them" footwear for people who desire comfort at home, work, and play. Made with the finest leathers and fabrics, look for fashionable styles that are trendy and fun to wear. For any occasion, Walking Cradles is the perfect fit!

Why choose between comfort and style when gorgeous sandals like this one from Walking Cradles are poised and ready to pamper your every step? Crafted with luxe leather, the Lila features an easy, slip-on design, with a breezy, open upper, hidden elastic goring at the side for flexibility and an adjustable hook-and-loop strap to snug up the fit. The cushy, lined footbed is perforated for added breathability, while the rubber sole lends just enough height for wearing stylishly with both casual slacks and skirts.

Walking Cradles is the "Want Them. Need Them. Must Have Them" footwear for people who desire comfort at home, work, and play. Made with the finest leathers and fabrics, look for fashionable styles that are trendy and fun to wear. For any occasion, Walking Cradles is the perfect fit!
